master_config.title: Master Configuration
master_config.description:
This adds a master configuration instance of View Assist

It must be added before you can setup any View Assist device instances if a new install or any more View Assist devices instances if an existing install

You may need to refresh any existing View Assist devices to enable the full functionality

data_description.name: The View Assist satellite name
data_description.mic_device: The microphone device for this satellite
data_description.mediaplayer_device: The media player device for this satellite
data_description.musicplayer_device: The music player device for this satellite
data_description.intent_device: The device to provide intent data for this satellite

data_description.dashboard: The base dashboard for View Assist (do not include trailing slash)
data_description.home: The screen to return to after timeout
data_description.music: The view to return to when in music mode
data_description.intent: The view to display for default HA actions for displaying those entities
data_description.list_view: The view to display when updating a list

data_description.rotate_background_path: Load images from in local mode, save images to in download mode, ignored in linked mode.  A path under config/view_assist
data_description.rotate_background_linked_entity: View Assist entity to link the background to
data_description.rotate_background_interval: Interval in minutes to rotate the background

data_description.assist_prompt: The Assist notification prompt style to use for wake word detection and intent processing
data_description.font_style: The default font to use for this satellite device. Font name must match perfectly and be available
data_description.status_icons_size: Size of the icons in the status icon display
data_description.status_icons: Advanced option! List of custom launch icons to set on start up. Do not change this if you do not know what you are doing
data_description.menu_items: List of items to show in the menu when activated
data_description.menu_timeout: Time in seconds before menu automatically closes (0 to disable timeout)
data_description.screen_mode: Show or hide the header and sidebar

data.weather_entity: Weather entity to use for conditons display
data.do_not_disturb: Enable do not disturb at startup

data_description.mode: The default mode for this satellite device
data_description.view_timeout: The default time out value for this satellite device in seconds before returning to default view
data_description.do_not_disturb: Default state for do not disturb mode on HA restart
data_description.use_announce: Some media player devices, like BrowserMod, cannot use the Home Assistant announce feature while media is playing. This option allows for turning off announce messages if problems arise. Default is on.
data_description.ducking_volume: Lower media playback volume by this percentage when Assist is active

data_description.enable_updates: Enable or disable update notifications for the dashboard, views and blueprints

data_description.developer_device: The browser id of the device you wish to use for development
data_description.developer_mimic_device: The device to mimic for development

options.audio_only: View Assist device with no display

options.blur_pop_up: Blurs the screen and shows pop up

options.local_sequence: Sequenced image from local file path
options.local_random: Random image from local file path
